myExercises.title: My Exercises
myExercises.activeProgramsDescription: Your current exercise programs based on pain assessments

1.title: Understanding Back Pain
1.description: Learn about the common causes of back pain and how to manage it effectively.

exercisePlanPage.generalDescription: Don't have time for individual programs? Here you will find a personalized program with the most important exercises from your programs. Follow the instructions and stop exercising if you feel pain.
exercisePlanPage.title: Exercise Plan

exercisePlan.suitableQuestion: Is this exercise suitable for you?
exercisePlan.painQuestion: 1. Does this exercise cause you pain?
exercisePlan.changeQuestion: 2. Do you want to change this exercise?
exercisePlan.changeRequestInfo: After submitting this request, we will contact you regarding a suitable exercise replacement.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.text: These exercises are recommended based on your assessment. If you experience severe pain or discomfort, please consult with a healthcare professional.

followUp.title: Progress Follow-up
followUp.responsesSaved: Your responses have been successfully saved.

questions.painLevelChange: How would you rate your pain compared to your last assessment?
questions.painNatureChanged: Has the nature of your pain changed since your last assessment?
questions.painNatureDescription: How has the nature of your pain changed?
questions.painSpreading: Has your pain spread to new areas?
questions.newPainArea: Which new areas has the pain spread to?
questions.exerciseEffectiveness: How effective are the exercises in relieving your pain?
questions.exerciseCompliance: How often do you follow the recommended exercise plan?
questions.painTriggers: Have the factors that trigger your pain changed?
questions.painReliefFactors: Have the factors that relieve your pain changed?
questions.overallImprovement: How do you rate the overall improvement of your condition?
questions.medicationUse: Are you using any pain medication?
questions.medicationEffectiveness: How effective is your pain medication?
questions.sleepQuality: How does pain affect the quality of your sleep?
questions.dailyActivities: How does pain affect your daily activities?
questions.workImpact: How does pain affect your work or studies?
questions.moodImpact: How does pain affect your mood?
questions.socialImpact: How does pain affect your social activities?
questions.treatmentSatisfaction: How satisfied are you with your current treatment?
